summary: In Paris, Clara, psycho motor therapist, and Ismaël, music teacher, have been lovers for four years. Happy, the couple are expecting their first child and decide to move in together. But ... See full summary »
cast: Cécile de France|Roschdy Zem|Pascal Elbé|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Martine Chevallier|Bérangère Bonvoisin|Leïla Bekhti|Naima Lamcharki|Antoine Chappey|Mickaël Masclet|Abdelhafid Metalsi|David Elmaleh|Abdellah Moundy|Jean-Claude Frissung|André Oumansky|Laurent Rey|Simon Bakhouche|Farida Ouchani|Sonia Tahar|Samira Zamzem|Sylvie Leclerc|Frédérique Moidon|Céline Bodis|Axelle Charvoz|Pierre Alloggia|Marianne Viard|Hélène Hardouin|Hervé Falloux|Anne Cantineau|Xavier Beauvois|Diane Delaye
title: Mauvaise foi
